concept.definition: The consent applies directly to the instance of the resource.
The consent applies directly to the instance of the resource and instances it refers to.
The consent applies directly to the instance of the resource and instances that refer to it.
The consent applies to instances of resources that are authored by.

description: How a resource reference is interpreted when evaluating contract offers.
name: ContractDataMeaning

text.div:
ContractDataMeaning

How a resource reference is interpreted when evaluating contract offers.

This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/contract-data-meaning defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
instance InstanceThe consent applies directly to the instance of the resource.
related RelatedThe consent applies directly to the instance of the resource and instances it refers to.
dependents DependentsThe consent applies directly to the instance of the resource and instances that refer to it.
authoredby AuthoredByThe consent applies to instances of resources that are authored by.

title: ContractDataMeaning
